title: Overview
description:
Too much to read but too less time? Now you have Overview!

Overview is on the path of becoming the next-generation news radio. 

Powered by the best AI summarization and text-to-speech technology, we provide short audio briefings for your favourite online articles daily. Our new sources covers a wide range of topics, including subscribed content such as The Economist, Bloomberg, TechCrunch, Hacker News, Tech in Asia, etc.
